==Japanese==
{{ja-kanjitab|己|等}}

===Etymology 1===
A compound of [[俺#Pronoun|ore]] and [[等#Japanese|ra]].

====Pronoun====
{{ja-pos|pronoun|おれら|おれら}}

# first person pronoun; may be singular or plural in usage: I, we
# second person plural pronoun: you guys

===Etymology 2===
Contraction of orera → oira.

====Pronoun====
{{ja-pos|pronoun|おいら|おいら}}

# first person pronoun; may be singular or plural in usage: I, we.

=====Usage notes=====
During the early modern era used by women. Now primary used by men.
